img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

strong.span: Watch this month's School Board Meeting by clicking on the link below that says "Opening Sesson" at 5 p.m.
The school board meeting will resume regular session at 6:30 p.m. today. Click on the link that says "Regular Session" below to view the meeting at approximately 6:30.

p.strong: Under the direction of Governor Northam, all Tazewell County Public Schools will remain closed this year due to the Coronavirus.

strong.strong: Click HERE to view the K-12
Looking for our Pre-K/Headstart registration packet? Click HERE!

div.span: *If you are unable to print a registration packet from home please contact the school to arrange a time to pick one up at the school. Please keep your completed packet until school offices reopen for visitors.

div.strong: Attention! We are making changes to our meal distribution program. Read more HERE.

strong.span: If you have a child that is being provided special education services through an individualized education program (IEP) in our schools please click HERE to complete a short survey.

span.strong: Thank you for your assistance! Tazewell County Public Schools is working hard to provide the best possible education for our students

img.alt: Icon to download Adobe Flash Player

p.span: The Tazewell County School Board does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, age or religion in its programs and activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the nondiscrimination policies: Supervisor of Human Resources, 506 Jeffersonville Street, Tazewell, VA 24651, 276-988-5511

The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding disability issues under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and the Americans with Disabilities Act: Director of Special Education, 506 Jeffersonville St., Tazewell, VA 24651, 276-988-5511
For further information on notice of nondiscrimination, see list of OCR enforcement offices for the address and phone number of the office that serves your area, or call 1-800-421-3481.

A copy of the Division School Quality Profile or the individual School Quality Profiles are available at the Tazewell County School Board Office in the town of Tazewell or at the individual schools for pick-up. You can also access our school quality profiles HERE.

tr.td: Tazewell County Public Schools • 506 Jeffersonville St., Tazewell, VA 24651 • Phone: (276) 988-5511
